job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in finance, accounting, business administration, economics, engineering, mathematics, statistics or a related technical or quantitative field

jd: From: Akash Kumar, Sonitalent Corp akash.kumar@sonitalentcorp.com Reply to: akash.kumar@sonitalentcorp.com HiHope you are doing well,We are looking for “Senior Business Process Consultant”. Please let me know if you are looking for this role and send me your updated resume also. Job Title: Senior Business Process Consultant Location: ONSITE - Candidate MUST be local to the DC Duration: 6+ monthsInterview: Phone/ Skype-2RoundsVisa: NoH1B, CPT &OPTLinkedIn Must haveJob Description: Candidate must complete/return the skill matrix below. Key Responsibilities… Stakeholder Engagement: Work closely with program teams to ensure alignment between business goals and system functionalities. Requirement Gathering: Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business needs and document technical and functional requirements that align with DLCP’s goals. Process Analysis and Improvement: Evaluate existing business processes, gather and analyze data, and recommend improvements that drive efficiency and reduce operational risks. Business Process Mapping: Develop detailed workflow charts, diagrams, and process documentation to visualize business operations and identify areas for re-engineering. Business Process Engineering/Re-Engineering: Work closely with IT and Data Teams to visualize DLCP’s Business Architecture and implementing Data Driven organization Data Analysis and Reporting: Use tools like Tableau, SQL, and Excel to analyze operational data, create 1 Use or disclosure of this data is subject to the restrictions on the title page of this proposal or quotation. CDSLLC reports, and identify trends that inform decision-making. Testing and Validation: Assist in validating new processes and systems through testing and user acceptance reviews, ensuring they meet business and functional requirements. Customer Outreach: Assist in developing and designing Customer outreach programs that promote DLCP’s goals and increase customer engagement Solicit the team for reporting needs, areas of opportunity, dashboard requests, and cost reduction opportunities. Consult on the analysis of an application, troubleshoots system problems, and recommend solutions. Basic Qualifications… Education: Bachelor's degree in finance, accounting, business administration, economics, engineering, mathematics, statistics or a related technical or quantitative field Experience: 3+ years of business analyst, data analyst or similar role experience preferably in government or regulatory environment Technical Skills: 3+ years of Excel (including VBA, pivot tables, array functions, power pivots, etc.). Proficiency in SQL and process mapping software (e.g., Visio, Miro, Draw.io etc), and data visualization tools such as Tableau, Seaborn etc. Experience with any programming language and automated testing tools is a plus. Soft Skills: Strong analytical thinking, problem-solving abilities, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work cross-functionally with teams. MINIMUM EDUCATION/CERTIFICATION REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor’s degree in finance, accounting, business administration, economics, engineering, mathematics, statistics, or related field or equivalent experience CLIENT REQUIREMENTSItemSkillsRequired orYears ofCandidate's Years of Exp.DesiredExperience1Bachelor's degree in IT, finance, business administration, economics, engineering, related field or equivalent experienceRequired15 211-15 yrs.
